results.title: Effect of single-drug therapy on reduction of left atrial size in mild to moderate hypertension: comparison of six antihypertensive agents.
results.text_hl: For @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Heterotaxy_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059446 @@@left atrial enlargement@@@, left atrial size decreased significantly with @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@clonidine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ at 1 year and with all treatments at 2 years.

citations.NLM: Gottdiener JS, Reda DJ, Williams DW, Materson BJ, Cushman W, Anderson RJ. Effect of single-drug therapy on reduction of left atrial size in mild to moderate hypertension: comparison of six antihypertensive agents. Circulation. 1998 Jul 14;98(2):140-8. PMID: 9679720
